text: Apart from two minor comments, good to go. It is clearer indeed !
@AlexandreAbraham  I fixed accordingly to your comments
We use "eg" instead of "ex" as in `the files, eg (...)`. Also, I would say `file_path` instead of `file_name` ot underline the fact that `subfolder/file_name` is a valid value.

text: If a filename is not found, the download is immediately cancelled (with your sentence, I have the impression that we download the rest of the files before failing). You should also state that the downloaded files are erased (I'll add an option to override this behavior later).
